website_summaries.verdict: If you’re a veteran drone enthusiast in the market for something truly different, this high-flying, agile, speedy, and long-lasting transforming drone should be on your radar.
pros: Flies as a quadcopter or airplane for 2 drones in one
cons: While the ability to freely transform from plane to quadcopter is extremely cool, this is advanced drone model isn’t recommended for beginners

customer_reviews.title: Nice drone/airplane for beginngers
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent drone for beginners wanting to learn how to fly a drone or for someone wanting to learn how to fly an r/c airplane cause this product will teach you how to do both. I have read complaints on poor battery life. I have gotten 10 mins of battery life with the standard battery and a little over 11 mins with aftermarket batteries. One warning do not fly this past 60 meters other wise you may lose connection and if it is over water when this happens it will land in the water because the fail-safe feature when you lose connection is to auto-land. otherwise this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a great experience! 🙄 WARNING - these guys are just shipping returns str8 to new customers!
customer_reviews.text: Welp, I'll fly it one day, maybe..... NOW, WITH PRE-EXPANDED BATTERY POUCHES!! That's right kids - don't worry about screwing up the charge cycle; WE DID IT FOR YOU! You just aren't getting that kind of value anywhere else, kids. Oh, also the pre-expanded battery expansion will crack open the cheap case that's supposed to hold it, so the battery won't even fit into the thing, so I can't fly it. NOT THAT IT WOULD MATTER, because ALTHOUGH I clearly bought the kit WITH the controller, I received no such thing, with the sticker on the box even saying with no controller 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Cline

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to fly for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to fly for beginners. Can start with just hovering and getting use to the controls, then switch to plane mode when you are more advanced. Batteries last longest when in plane mode with little wind. I bought 3 more batteries so my kids and I can all I have a turn. Phone hookup allows you to see how much battery is left and allows you to do some one button tricks. Camera is basically useless, but I don't mind- don't have any need for it. Tough construction- it can withstand drops and running into stuff. Would definitely buy again!

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for R/C fans
customer_reviews.text: I have flown R/C fixed wing for 35 years. I never really became interested in drones until last month. I purchased this little guy because of the price honestly. WOW is all I can say. Reminds me of an Osprey VTOL in flight. So easy to fly. My wife has never flown R/C and took to this in seconds. I do not see how you can crash it unless you fly into something. The transition from vertical to horizontal flight is fun, and it zips around at a good click. MAKE A BIGGER ONE!! Great first or 50th buy. GET IT!

customer_reviews.title: Nice - flies like a drone and like a regular airplane.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this drone. It's neat that it flies like a drone and like a regular airplane. It does well in a medium sized backyard, even if it's a little breezy but not gusty. The low battery feature is neat (when the battery reaches 3% it automatically lands by itself as opposed to crashing). We've accidently crashed it a few times into the bushes and it still works well. Also, I've only used the remote and haven't hooked up my cel phone. Thanks Parrot!
